name: Acheron

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: A drifter claiming to be a Galaxy Ranger. Her true name is unknown.She walks the cosmos alone, carrying with her a long sword.

skills.name: Trilateral Wiltcross
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Octobolt Flash
skills.description: Gains #3[i] points of "Slashed Dream." Inflicts #3[i] stacks of "Crimson Knot" on a single enemy and deals Lightning DMG to them, as well as minor Lightning DMG to adjacent targets.

skills.name: Slashed Dream Cries in Red
skills.description: Deals 3 hits of minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy. If the Crimson Knot is removed from the target, then deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies. Finally, deals 1 hit of Lightning DMG to all enemies and removes all Crimson Knots.

skills.name: Atop Rainleaf Hangs Oneness
skills.description: When Slashed Dream has been maxed out, the Ultimate can be unleashed. During the Ultimate, deplete enemies' Toughness regardless of Weakness Types and reduce all enemies' All-Type RES. When any unit inflicts debuffs on an enemy target while using an ability, Acheron gains Slashed Dream and inflicts Crimson Knot on the enemy target.

skills.name: Quadrivalent Ascendance
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and gain Quadrivalent Ascendance at the start of each wave, dealing Lightning damage that ignores Weakness Types and depletes Toughness.If the attack hits ordinary enemies, it will instantly defeat them and you will not enter combat. The Technique Point is not spent if the attack does not hit an enemy.

skills.name: Rainblade
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy, and removes up to 3 stacks of Crimson Knot from the target. When Crimson Knot is removed, deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies 1 time, with the DMG multiplier for this attack increased for every stack of Crimson Knot removed.

skills.name: Rainblade
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy, and removes up to 3 stacks of Crimson Knot from the target. When Crimson Knot is removed, deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies 1 time, with the DMG multiplier for this attack increased for every stack of Crimson Knot removed.

skills.name: Rainblade
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy, and removes up to 3 stacks of Crimson Knot from the target. When Crimson Knot is removed, deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies 1 time, with the DMG multiplier for this attack increased for every stack of Crimson Knot removed.

skills.name: Stygian Resurge
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to all enemies and removes all Crimson Knot stacks.

eidolons.name: Silenced Sky Spake Sooth
eidolons.description: Increases CRIT Rate by 18% when dealing DMG to debuffed enemies. When Slashed Dream is at max, every stack of Slashed Dream that goes over grants a stack of Quadrivalent Ascendance, which can stack up to 3 times.

eidolons.name: Mute Thunder in Still Tempest
eidolons.description: The number of characters on the Path of Nihility required for the highest value of the Trace, The Abyss, is reduced by 1. At the beginning of Acheron's turn, gain 1 point of Slashed Dream. Additionally, inflict 1 stack of Crimson Knot on an enemy with the most Crimson Knot.

eidolons.name: Frost Bites in Death
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Shrined Fire for Mirrored Soul
eidolons.description: Inflicts Vulnerability to Ultimate DMG when enemies enter battle and increases the DMG they take from Ultimates by 12%.

eidolons.name: Strewn Souls on Erased Earths
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Apocalypse, the Emancipator
eidolons.description: The Ultimate's CRIT DMG increases by 60%, and the DMG from Acheron's Basic ATK and Skill will also be considered as Ultimate DMG.
